title_text: Complete review on Flipkart : Online shopping cent
Review: A few business gatherings, including CAIT, were blamed for abusing outside speculation rules Web based business organizations dismiss charges, said - are working under principles Claims of giving in excess of 50 percent markdown on certain items Itemized During the merry season, Amazon and Walmart-possessed Flipkart have gone ahead the Legislature of India radar for selling items at enormous discounts.The government is researching whether the standards identified with remote venture are being disregarded because of overwhelming exclusion. An authority of the Service of Business gave this data The legislature presented new standards in February with the target of securing the interests of 13 crore individuals subject to little retailers by the alluring offers made on web based shopping. These standards constrained web based business organizations to change their business structure, despite the fact that the US condemned it. Simultaneously there was expanded pressure in the business relations among India and America.On this issue, Amazon and Flipkart were continually looking at agreeing to all the standards, while nearby business associations affirmed that the two organizations are charging colossal add up to give limits during the ebb and flow happy season. Now and again, in excess of 50 percent markdown has been given. As indicated by sources, Flipkart offers to forgo commissions to merchants offering limits on items now and again. Business Service authorities said the administration is examining the grievances and the proof gave by the Confederation of All India Dealers (CAIT), which had blamed Amazon and Flipkart for abusing outside speculation rules. CAIT speaks to 70 million retail brokers in the country.Sales of retail dealers diminished by 40 percent It is significant that last week, delegates of Amazon, Flipkart and CAIT met before the Business Service to examine this issue. CAIT general secretary Praveen Khandelwal stated, "Because of substantial limits, clients are shopping on the web. Because of this, the offers of retailers have descended by 30 to 40 percent this month.Flipkart offered a rebate to dealers As indicated by two messages from Flipkart venders in September, the organization offered incomplete installment of limits only days before the bubbly season. As per an email, "In the event that the dealer diminishes the cost of the item by 15%, at that point the organization will bear 9% trouble if there should be an occurrence of 3% or 30% discount."A source related with Flipkart said that all the impetuses are under Indian principles and are proposed to urge merchants to gain by lessening the commission they pay.Unfair advantages to certain sellers! The All India Online Merchants Affiliation said in an explanation that around 100 of its individuals have exploited Flipkart's fractional discount, making undue preferred position a few venders. After the purchase I am receiving calls from crime branch and they are claiming that the phone purchased is stolen and they are asking to submit the phone for the investigation. When I visited to check  Crime branch Indore to verify that calls was real or just a fraud, then I got to know that they were really from crime branch & that was true.According to crime branch Indore there are many phones of vivo purchased by many customer from different different platforms are stolen. According to them around thousand phones are having fake one IME no ends with 009 which was sold to many customers.As per crime branch there are many sellers who has sold stolen phone with one ime no. Around 1000 mobiles are detected on the one Ime no(same ime no which is mentioned in my phone information ends with 009) .As per them they are submitting all the phones which are purchased by same Ime no for the investigation so that they can trace all the seller & then they will block all the phones with same Ime No.I even have different IME no., IME no. in my phone Information is different from the IME no. mentioned in the invoice.  IME No. mentioned in invoice is 866066038540757 & in Phone information IME no mentioned is 8654070100000009, both are completely different.Police is submitting all the phones for the investigation. I have purchased this phone from Adilaxmi E-Commerce Pvt Ltd through Flip kart by paying those 22000. Now police has taken my phone & they are saying all the phones with this duplicate IME no. will be blocked after the investigation as it is having Fake IME No.Where is the assurance which was given by flip kart for the security n authenticity of the product of Adilaxmi E-Commerce Pvt Ltd? Flip kart claims that they sold original products then how came this type of stolen phone they have sold from Adilaxmi E-Commerce Pvt Ltd . According to police there are many other phones which are sold by Adilaxmi E-Commerce Pvt Ltd and flip kart.I don't understand I have lost my 22000 Rs & Phone too as Flip kart has sold stolen phone to me with fake IME No.  What wrong I have done I have just purchased the phone from Adilaxmi E-Commerce Pvt Ltd  through Flip kart where I lost the phone also as police is taking that n lost the money also which I paid to Adilaxmi E-Commerce Pvt Ltd through Flip kart for the stolen phone.Now Adilaxmi E-Commerce Pvt Ltd  and flip kart is saying they don't take any guarantee of this kind of thing. They are not ready to answer for any of this; soon I have also filed complaint in Consumer Forum against  Adilaxmi E-Commerce Pvt Ltd and Flipkart also so that people can see that Adilaxmi E-Commerce Pvt Ltd and Flip kart canât be trusted for the originality of products. Please check IME no before purchasing from any platform & kindly donât trust flip kart because they donât take any guarantee after this kind of fraud, they are not ready to help in anyway.Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

title_text: Collusion of Flipkart and Jeeves in deceiving cust
Review: I ordered Motorola Moto E6s handset from flipkart.com, on 19-Jan-20, which was delivered to me on 20-Jan-20. As the bottom part of the phone, the display has a grey patch of around 1.5 to 2 inches, I requested for a replacement of the same on 21-Jan-20.Accordingly, a technician's visit was scheduled for 22-Jan-20. The technician Mr. Adarsh from jeeves.co.in did accept that the display was "faulty", however, he misinformed me regarding the procedure of return. As per him, he uploaded the pictures of the faulty display that he clicked on his phone to their portal and that I would get a status update from Flipkart within two hours of him uploading the pictures. This was the first time ever, that a technician visit was scheduled for a problem I faced. Moreover, flipkart.com had not given me any details regarding the procedure to be followed, rather the precautions to be taken while handing over the phone to the technician, hence, I believed in whatever information he provided to me.However, as soon as he stepped out of my house, notwithstanding what he told me regarding the faulty display, he cunningly and arbitrarily rejected my request for a replacement. As soon as I found out about it, I called Flipkart toll free customer care number 18008899898 and informed them about the issue at length. I also specifically complained about Mr. Adarsh, and asked their customer care executives to make a note of his name in my complaint, and take the strictest action against him for uploading fake details.Thereafter, another technician visit was scheduled which was to take place on or before 27-Jan-20. Accordingly, another technician Mr. Satish from jeeves.co.in called on 24-Jan-20 and asked to come the same day. As I was busy on that day, I asked him to come on 25-Jan-20, to which he agreed. Accordingly, I got an SMS from VKjeeves confirming that the appointment was rescheduled to 25-Jan-20 at 12:00 pm.As the technician did not visit my site till 12:00 pm on 25-Jan-20, I called back on the number +912271872225 from which he had called on 24-Jan-20. Ironically, this call was received not by Mr. Satish but by Mr. Adarsh against whom I had complained. Over the phone, he once again lied to me that my request for replacement was rejected because I had not backed up the data in my phone. If that was the case, then he should have informed me about it. I would have done a factory reset right in front of him. In my case, the phone display is faulty, in some other cases, the display could be broken or the back cover could be broken. In all these cases, is data backup a mandatory requirement? As I could no longer take his lies, I told him to send Mr. Satish for a site visit instead of him. He once again very rudely remarked that Mr. Satish is busy at the moment and will come if he gets time.On the same day i.e., on 25-Jan-20 at 17:01 hours, I got another call from +912271872225 from Mr. Pervez Ansari (not sure if it is spelled as Pervez or Parvez). According to him, Mr. Adarsh asked him to visit me instead of Mr. Satish. During our phone call, he divulged a VERY IMPORTANT & CONFIDENTIAL piece of information regarding their performance rating. As per the information provided by him, their performance is rated "GOOD", if they "REJECT" the customers' requests for replacement and vice versa. Further, he has also confessed that the genuineness or otherwise of the customers' complaints has no bearing on whether their request for replacement will be "ACCEPTED" or "REJECTED". It is purely on the basis of the "REPORT" provided by them.The second technician visit NEVER HAPPENED and on the morning of 26-Jan-20, I learned that my request for replacement has been rejected. During this period I spoke with several of their customer care executives. A few of them being Ashish (22-Jan-20), Vishnu (23-Jan-20), Neelam (25-Jan-20), Aditya (25-Jan-20), Sanjay (25-Jan-20), Abhishek (25-Jan-20), Paramjeet (26-Jan-20). All of them say only one thing: "Aap nishchint rahiye. Aapki puri sahayta ki jaayegi", without giving a damn about the customer's problems. In my opinion, as a cost-saving measure, they should just program to repeat this every 30 seconds in their IVR, instead of hiring and paying for these employees.Also, after logging into my account, going to my orders page, and selecting the appropriate order, I have raised issues several times with this product. Miraculously, all of them get resolved, without any intimation to me!!!!On searching the internet regarding jeeves.co.in, I have found that many of the directors are associated with Flipkart.From all of the above, I infer the following:1) It is very likely that the products sold on Flipkart as "NEW" could be "REFURBISHED", and hence "DEFECTIVE".2) Flipkart and jeeves.co.in are associated companies3) Flipkart and jeeves.co.in through their technicians COLLUDE TO CHEAT CUSTOMERS BY REJECTING THEIR GENUINE REQUESTS FOR REPLACEMENT OF FAULTY PRODUCTS4) The technicians have powers more than judges of High Courts and Supreme Court to give the one-sided report, without requiring the customers' sign-off5) The only way to get your request for replacement approved by the technician is to give them a handsome BRIBE. That is the only thing that will make them go against their employers.I want the following:1) Return pick-up of the faulty product and a full refund of Rs. 6, 499/-.2) Return pick-up and refund of the accessories bought along with the product viz., scratch guards/tempered glasses (2 units of Rs. 99/- each)3) Strict action against all the three technicians viz., Mr. Adarsh, Mr. Satish, and Mr. Pervez Ansari with intimation to me.4) Strict action against all of your above customer care executives viz., Ashish, Vishnu, Neelam, Aditya, Sanjay, Abhishek, Paramjeet.Thanks,MandarFlag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

title_text: Don't buy anything from these thieves.... Beware!!
Review: This company is full of thieves and cheaters. My experience is such a tragic one I would never forgive these basstards they stole my money and did not deliver my product. I asked for a refund and they are not even ready to offer me my money back. I ordered a laptop key board skin through flipkart and initially selected the payment mode as cash on delivery(COD) but as the product reached the destination delivery center they enabled the option of payment through the Debit / Credit card or any other payment system available. Now I made the payment of the product through the debit card on the day of delivery as I was short of exact change and it got debited successfully from my bank account. But after the payment was done the flipkart app started displaying me message saying that "Payment was successful. But we are awaiting confirmation from our courier partner". I don't understand what the hell they have to confirm from the courier partner as I have made the payment using their mobile app and not their courier partners. The worst thing happened when their courier agent came to deliver the product I told that ashhole that I have already made the payment to Flipkart for the product and even showed him all the messages that I received from Bank and Flipkart instead he started demanding cash from me for the product when I denied paying him for the second time he started speaking to me very arrogantly and simply went back without handing me the product. title_text: WARNING: THIS COMMODE CHAIR CAN BE HAZARDOUS
Review: On 09 December 2019, I received delivery of the Orthtex commode chair I had ordered from Flipkart.I found so many flawed aspects in the piece that I received that I wrote the review(below), and tried several times to get it put out on the Flipkart review section online, along with the 1-star rating I had given it. Each time I submitted the review, I received a message saying: âThank you so much. Your review has been saved.âThere was no follow-up message from Flipkart to explain to me, as the buyer and reviewer, what this cryptic message meant, or why my review wasnât being published online for other potential customers to read. Did it exceed any word limit set for reviews?(No such word limit has been mentioned on the product page).Since I did not receive the courtesy of a response, or the opportunity to share my experience with others, I reproduce my review, below. I also intend putting it out on other suitable websites online in the interest of disseminating useful product information to consumers.(The seller of this product is Cousins Corporation, based in Ahmedabad).THE REVIEW:On opening the package itself, I found a loose screw that was just lying in one corner of the wrapping. On checking the stool, I found that one of the front legs was missing a screw, and that the loose screw was the missing one, since it matched the corresponding screw in the opposite leg.An attempt was made to fit the screw back in place, but it did not go in all the way, probably because the screw is in some way damaged(worn-out threads?). Because of this flaw, the back legs of the stool remain wobbly and unstable, which poses an obvious risk. I have not yet started using the stool, fearing that one or more legs may give way at any point.  Is this the level of quality that an orthopaedic seat should possess? It is meant to aid and assist, not to cause discomfort and anxiety.And this is not all. The stool legs were smelling of very fresh paint, even from a distance. This could have meant that the stool was a brand-new piece that had been painted just before being shipped to me â but I doubt that this is the explanation because the seat itself had graze marks in several places. It became clear to me that this is a âre-conditionedâ piece, and probably one that has been returned by another dissatisfied buyer.I had read previous complaints on this web page about this stoolâs screws coming off, and now I wish I had paid more heed to those complaints, instead of thinking it had happened to only a few people, and not expecting it to happen to me.I will add that there is a discrepancy between the product description and the product itself. On the Flipkart web page, the product is described as being â(grey, black)â in colour. The label on the packaged product, as well as the Tax Invoice, also falsely describe the colour as âgreyâ. But the colour of the stool is actually a shade of Midnight Blue. This may seem like just a matter of appearance, and unimportant in this kind of product. But the fact that the colour is consistently and falsely described as âgreyâ or âGrey / Blackâ by the seller and the e-commerce company speak of a lack of integrity and a shoulder-shrugging disrespect for the customer. This point(about the seat in the delivered product being a different colour from that displayed online by Flipkart) has also been mentioned in other product reviews of this commode chair(on the Flipkart web page).I have considered returning the product which remains unused, but Flipkartâs 10-days replacement policy is cleverly designed to favour itself and not the aggrieved customer. I will mention just two clauses in this policy which work against the customer:âThe product should be in unused, undamaged and original condition without any scratches or dentsâ.But how does one return a product without scratches when the seat(as I mentioned above) arrives at the customerâs door with grazes in several places? How is it okay for a product to be delivered in damaged condition, when it is not okay for it to be returned for replacement in damaged condition? Do no responsibility and culpability rest with the manufacturer and seller for making and selling a product in damaged condition?âThe productâs original packaging / box should be undamagedâ.But the commode stool did not come in a box of its own(which, by the way, also leaves a poor impression). It came in a corrugated cardboard packaging, wrapped so tightly around the stool that it was impossible to open it up without cutting and tearing through the packaging(although the label itself remains intact, bearing all details).But my greatest hesitation about opting for a replacement is that I may well get a piece that is in even worse condition than the present one!A commode stool is an aid used by people facing a certain level of physical difficulty â because they are elderly, ailing, have disability, are recovering from a Caesarean, etc. It is shameful and contemptible that the manufacturers should treat such a group of people with so little consideration that they try to dump sub-standard products on them. Is the profit margin all that matters?I believe Flipkart also has a responsibility in the matter. When there are several complaints about something as basic as badly-fitted screws, and as important as stable legs in an orthopaedic aid, should Flipkart be giving a platform to such manufacturers, in the bargain compromising its own reputation?I will be sharing my above experience on consumer websites. Consumers deserve a better deal than this kind of shoddy approach.IMPORTANT POSTSCRIPT:  I need to add a postscript to my review in view of what happened when I did try to use the chair for the first time(three days ago, on 27 December 2019).I had barely sat down on the chair for a couple of minutes when it collapsed, the back legs simply folding up. It is a folding chair, but is not supposed to fold spontaneously when you are sitting upon it; and I had definitely taken care to make sure the legs had been stretched open to max before sitting on it.I fell backward, hitting my head against the wall, with my legs entangled in the legs of the chair. I felt an excruciating pain in my left hip(which is already affected by arthritis),   and was in such a state of shock that I did not even know whether I would be able to get up. I was alone in my flat at the time, and could not call for help. It was several minutes before I managed to push the stool off me and literally crawl out of the bathroom.I need to add that what occurred had nothing to do with overweight. I weigh only 52 kg. My hip is still in severe pain(despite the use of pain-killers),   and my mobility is restricted because of the pain.Before buying this product, I had checked out the customer reviews and found that most of them were positive. But I now wish I had paid more heed to the fewer but very precise negative comments which included the following:âI just literally fell down, sitting on itâ¦ bolts are loose ââThe back legs of the commode fold by itself, and the commode will fully fold suddenly while sitting and person sitting can break waist, hips, legs or hands.ââWhen you sit down on a chair, its bases are assembled and person will be fall downâ¦ very bad.ââThe chairâs legs are oddly shaped and unstable. My aged mom fell down numerous times. Wish to return thisâ¦ââChair legs not sturdyâ.âLeg rod bent in just 15 daysâThere were several other complaints on these lines, and others relating to scratches on the seat âlike a used oneâ; plastic quality of the seat âvery badâ; loose screws and worn-out threads; product colour different from what is shown online.But, what made me decide to buy the product is the fact that the positive reviews greatly outnumbered  the negative ones, using descriptions such as âJust wow!â, âMind-blowing purchaseâ, âWonderfulâ, âHighly recommendedâ, âTerrificâ, âAwesomeâ, âFabulous!â etc, etc â¦ But, on the basis of my personal experience, I have to wonder how many of these positive reviews are authentic. In my mind, now, there will always remain a question mark over that.Of course, there is no question of my ever using this chair again; it is just too risky.But, at the least, I hope that my experience will sound an alarm bell to others who may be thinking of buying the product. You do so at your own risk.Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

Hi all!I have ordered Acer Laptop on 2nd Oct on Flipkart & the original date of delivery was 20th Oct 2019.On 20th Oct...I received a msg saying delivery is delayed by 3 days...& Same thing happened on 23rd Oct...No delivery but the another msg stating further delay of 72 hours...Same thing continued for next 2 weeks & finally on 4th Nov. 2019, I got delivery of a WRONG PRODUCT in the form of Intex Speakers (cost Rs. 1499), instead of my originally ordered product i.e. Acer Laptop ( cost Rs 39000).I informed this to Flipkart via email & calls on 4th Nov itself. Flipkart executive requested 72 hours to find out the misplaced product & further investigation. After 72 hours, i.e. on 7th Nov, I enquired about delivery of my laptop then they said it wil be done on 9th Nov as investigation is still going on & nothing happened on 9th Novâ¦as usual.After talking to Flipkart Executive, he assured me of the delivery on 11th Nov. We waited & waited & waitedâ¦but no one turned up for delivery even on 11th Nov. Then again I called Flipkart. They again asked for 2 days time to resolve my issue.On 13th Nov same thing happened. Neither the delivery of my original product nor the pick up of wrongly delivered product. title_text: Dubious sellers are banking on flipkart's loophole
Review: Hi folks!Here's an online shopping experience which left me with a bitter taste. This is regarding a purchase I made in the just concluded Flipkart's Diwali festival sale period. This scenario is not limited to just sale period though. It can happen even otherwise but the sale period seems to be the most conducive period for unscrupulous sellers for disposing off their defective merchandise. Because the benefits like cash-backs offered during these period serve as "sweet bait" and "too hard" to resist!To begin with, I was looking for a particular model of a voltage stabilizer "VGuard VGX 400" which I couldn't find anywhere else other than Flipkart. Otherwise my first choice would be Amazon.Luckily on Flipkart, I found four of its listings. But the confusing part about these listings was that each of them were posted by the SAME seller who goes by the title "DKFOREVER". All four of them were of the exact SAME model and SAME color with no mention of their individual status which causes me to assume that they must all be "NEW". However, two of them were assured by Flipkart and two were not. The assured ones were priced considerably higher compared to their non-assured counterparts. Another difference I noticed was that each of them were listed with a slightly modified title heading, which I believe may be an attempt by seller to make it appear that they are from different sellers!Why would a seller do that? I tried to contact the seller but unfortunately Flipkart doesn't have such provision in place. This has even been confirmed by Flipkart's senior customer service managers. Keep this in mind:FLIPKART DOESN'T HAVE A PROVISION FOR A BUYER TO CONTACT SELLER!Now, here's the catch. At a first glance for someone who's looking at the product's listing, it gives an impression that all four of them could be from different sellers! And as the human nature has it, we tend to pick the cheapest one just as I did. The reason I did that is because I thought even if I had ordered higher priced ones, I may end up getting the same product regardless because the seller is same across all four listings!But right from the point I clicked "Buy", I have been doubting that there must be something not-so-right with the low priced ones like they might have been damaged / refurbished / used / returned or something like that.Not-for nothing! As suspected, the item I received turned out to be a defective and a used one. There were signs of physical damage on the metal casing - the rear of the metal chassis was recessed slightly into the frame and the corner was clearly seen to be dented. Even the power cord was chipped a little to make it appear that it was an UNUSED one. All these tell tale signs suggest that the product was a used one and that it either must have suffered a severe fall or got pounded badly. This for me, is not acceptable. I immediately requested a replacement.The story doesn't end here. The item was rescheduled for pickup four times! Every time, the pickup was scheduled, the pick up person would cite some inappropriate reason like "mismatch" and by doing so, it would render the replacement request cancelled. No wonder why Flipkart calls them "wish-masters"! Everything happens at their whim and wish! This pickup guy whose name is "KRANTHI" was somewhat reckless in his attitude. The first time he came to my place, he told me that he could not accommodate the item in his vehicle. At other times, he skipped the pickup altogether without a reason and would close the process citing the aforementioned reason! I raised complaints against him with Flipkart. I don't know if they ever bother to take action against him.What this implies is that if you don't notice this on time and don't take any action during the stipulated 10-day return period, like re-initiating the replacement / refund request, the status stands cancelled and you get to keep the item with you.My question is who on earth authorized a pickup guy to cancel the replacement request without actually visiting the premises where the pickup is scheduled? This is clearly a loophole in the logistics operations. No online retailer should allow this to happen. Ultimately it is the customer who will lose.After speaking to numerous executives and some senior ones, at last, I was told that the seller did not have another piece for replacement and that I didn't have any option but to seek refund. At the behest of the senior executive who passed on this information, I sought refund.But what happened in the end? I lost out on other potential purchases which could have offered me equally impressive discounts. When I raised this point with senior managers, they said that they couldn't help it as the Diwali festival offer had already concluded.So, to summarize, I was trying in vain to get a replacement for over a week all to hear that the replacement wasn't possible and lost out on the 10% cashback had I bought a similar item elsewhere.Folks, enough of these festival offers. In reality, there are NO FREE LUNCHES and THERE CANNOT BE SOMETHING FOR NOTHING or SOMETHING THAT IS CHEAP AND BEST.Even I had availed better offers in the past but the pricing was reasonable. This is not for the first time I'm shopping from Flipkart either. I've been purchasing items online since 2007. A good many of them were also from China, Singapore & US. I've also imported items by paying duties. I'm telling you all this to establish that I'm not new to online purchases.Next time when you spot a listing with unusually low price, suspect that it could be defective.So, Flipkart has become a conducive platform for dubious sellers especially during the festival sales period. I urge customers not to be penny wise and pound foolish; we safeguard and count pennies while pounds slip away from pockets - just like that! Be a cautious buyer.PS: I even intimated a senior customer service manager from Flipkart in my last communication with him/her that I would be posting this review on mouthshut.com.Thank you all,Regards,Hemanth.Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

Order ID-OD116671577527415000I ordered a Redmi note 7 Pro in the Big billion sale on 30th September with 11th oct as the delivery date for the product. I've put my old phone, Moto G4 Play on exchange and so during the last couple of days when I got the message that my order has reached the nearest hub, I got the backup from my phone and reset it as per the instructions to keep it ready for the exchange.The delivery guy came on 11th and asked for the phone first which needed to be exchanged. The phone was in working condition with no dents or any other issues mentioned in the exchange program. The delivery guy switched on the phone, checked all the aspects and then told me that an additional 600 shall be charged for one of the dents at the bottom. There were no dents on the phone  and I very well pointed that out but he said that he had sent the pictures and he was getting the increased cost. When I checked the increased cost, there was no information of the source from where the additional cost was coming and neither did I receive any message for the same. After much haggle, however, I agreed as I was in dire need of the product since I had been managing without one from a couple of days.When I prepared to give him cash, I asked him for the product but he promptly rejected stating that I need to give the cash first. This had never happened before and it made me cautious. I told him that if he cannot handover the product then he should at least open it for me so that I can check the order to confirm it is the one I placed or to be more precise, there is actually a phone inside. He refused that too saying that if a phone is not in the packet then I can ask for the refund later and I shall get my money back. I requested him a couple of times saying that I have money in hand and I'm not going to run away with it as I'm standing at my doorstep and there is no way I'm not paying if a phone is inside the packet but he said that I can go to the warehouse myself to collect the order but he will not give it without the total initial plus the additional cost. I was kept in a situation where I should give 10, 000 rs with no confirmation message of the increased cost and no guarantee of the product. This is when I asked him to leave and took my old phone back.I raised an issue with the Flipkart team and had conversations with four of the customer service executives, all telling me that there is nothing that they can do until the order status is updated by the delivery company. I got in touch with the delivery company as well but they had no clue about it either. I've never  experienced such discomfort with online shopping in my life and when I searched about it on internet I got to know that I'm not the only one. A lot of people on a daily basis face the same kind of unprofessional behavior from Flipkart and this is the worst site to buy anything that costs you more than 500 bucks. The site and the delivery process cannot be trusted with your orders and there is absolutely no one to help you out in any awry situation. I've still not received my order and I'm never ever going to buy anything from this site ever again.Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

title_text: Order cancelled without informing or approval
Review: I have been a customer with Flipkart for a very long time and I am really disappointed with the kind of treatment rendered to me on my latest order.I place my order under exchange of my old phone and was promised a delivery on 3rd Oct 2019. The wishmaster came for the delivery and upon checking my old phone said there is a problem with the touch on the screen and phone cant be exchanged and need to pay the balance in cash to take the delivery.On bringing to his notice that as per Flipkarts exchange policy even if there is an issue with the product that needs to be exchanged, it can still be done after paying the lesser exchange value(in this case Rs.2000 as the touch not working). He said will check with his manager after going to the office and will come back to do the delivery next day.We waited for the entire day taking an off from work so the delivery can be taken but he never came nor there was any contact with him.So I called Flipkart helpline on 4th evening to check on the order delivery and was assured the Team is working on it and will be resolved by 9th Oct 2019 at the Max.Today I received a message that the order is cancelled that too without my knowledge or approval.On contacting the contact center again, where Swati(frontline) had communication issues and said to reorder as she cant change the status of the current order and there is no way she can raise a dispute / complaint.Why would I want to reorder the same product at a higher price?I was then connected to Shubham on the escalation desk but he too said cant help.So I asked for a manager and Priti came on line(I highly doubt she was a manager as she was worst than Swati in communication) and ACCEPTED that the issue was from Flipkart and there is a flaw in the system. If you already know there is a flaw then you need to work on resolving the issue to have abetter customer experience.I am now writing this for sheer bad customer experience rendered upon me starting from the Wishmaster to contact center staff.Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

title_text: Never go for an exchange,as flipkart is fraud.
Review: Hii guys, here I am sharing with you my experience about Flipkart.Just 2 weeks ago, I ordered Realm2 in exchange of Redmi A1, the delivery was attempted just the next day ( impressive) .The delivery guy first took the old phone to examine it, they way he was examining the phone was like he was preparing to get into CID, anyway there was a little scratch on the screenguard, he started refusing the exchange, I told him that the scratch is only on the glass not on the display, the screen is completely intact, then he remove the glass and examined, my claim came to be true, the screen was intact, I thought now finally I will have the new phone in exchange of my old phone, I just started taking out my purse to pay the remaining amount, then hell of sudden he said "ye exchange ni ho skta ( this can't be exchanged) "I asked him why? Whts the problem now, then hi showed me a little minor discolor on the back below the camera, it would be almost equal to a point, not bigger than that, but he didn't hear me, which really angered me alot, I asked him to call his senior, he was hesitating first then he agreed and called the hub's coordinator but also said the same thing, even after 20 mints of all this drama I couldn't buy my Realme2.Worst experience!Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! title_text: Why Flipkart Standards are Spiraling down??
Review: Last week we had ordered a Mobile from Flipkart.com(Order No: OD116213834846926000)What we received was a used and defective mobile phone(having Network issues and with torn internal package and without Instruction manuals.) Just think - did you ever received a mobile phone package without Instruction manuals, and everything torn out internally? Initially, they rejected our Return/Refund request. But, after much persuasion we were able to return it and get refund for the product.I was a big fan of Flipkart and had ordered many Products from them, and this was the dirtiest experience faced by us. And amazingly, when we complained about our mobile phone issue to Flipkart, they immediately removed the Seller(called:  "Rinku Deal"), from our Order details. Probably they thought that we would give a negative feedback for the Seller.Another problem of these companies is their customer service, and their availability and knowledge. Its extremely hard to reach them as everybody now-a-days are automating the entire process to save money.Probably these companies should be avoided by us in the near future. I have learned my lesson the hard way, and probably its better to go personally to the Electronics store and buy our products. At least we know what we are buying.Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

title_text: Good Bye Flipkart. Worst Flipkart Delivery People
Review: I order a phone on flipkart along with an exchange for old phone. The delivery guy inspected my old phone which I am using. first he removed the flip cover when I asked him why? he replied thats company policy then he broke my temper glass. while removing the temper glass he also damaged my existing phone display. he inspected my phone as if he is a mobile mechanic. Absolute cheating by Flipkart in the name of exchange offer! I had ordered a mobile on exchange offer on 7th August(Order no OD116205018856077000). They had promised to pay an additional Rs. 2k on exchange(total of 4950) for my moto g5 plus. But the Executive who came to deliver the mobile on 9th simply refused to exchange stating that there was colour change in the side of display. When we tried to convince him that it was only due to the tempered glass which we had just then removed, he just said that he could not accept as his team leader would not accept the same. He then asked for 4, 850 in cash to deliver the mobile which we refused. When I complained about the same to Flipkart, they apologised for the error and assured that they would exchange my mobile and deliver the new one by 11th august and that I would receive a call from the technical team by 11th. But I have not received any call from them and today evening, I received another message stating that the technical team would call me by 12th august with no promise about delivery date. Incidentally, the same executive came to my house today night to deliver another item in my order and on my prompting him why he didn't accept my mobile, he stated that his team leader had told him in advance not to accept the mobile!After I posted about the issue in Social Media on 12th August, I received a call from the Social Media Team on the same day who promised to resolve the issue within 24-48 hours, and asked for detailed photographs of each part of the phone. I sent everything within 10 minutes, but the same day in teh night, I receive a mail from Flipkart stating that my order has been cancelled and the amount would be refunded.  When I mentioned the same to the Social Media Team(Mr.Nishant) the next day, he assured that they are still working on the complaint and assured that there would be a resolution as the amount is yet to be refunded.  But yesterday the same person contacts me again and says that as the order has been cancelled and amount already refunded, I have to place a fresh order and they would assure that the item would be exchanged and new phone delivered.  When I asked him whether I would get the same offers as I received for the previous phone, he said that it would not be possible.So it is now very very clear that their only intention was to lure customers into buying with additional exchange offers and then reject exchange and then force them to buy at a higher price. Really upset with this company which was once a true Indian company with high ethics.  Was continuing with my complaint that I would atleast get some resolution after repeated complaints, but now it is very clear that this was a planned cheating by your website right from teh beginning.So this is the way Flipkart cheats their customers in the name of additional exchange offer - lure customers first with exchange offers and then reject exchange for flimsy reasons and force the Customer to pay extra and take the mobile!Absolutely disgusted with this cheating by FlipkartRithesh Kumar JainFlag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

I ordered VU 65" television on Thursday 8th August. The order was delivered the very next day. Great job. Then the installation was promised by Saturday 10th August.I contacted flipkart cust care, 1800 208 9898, on 10th August 12:59 PM, to inform them about the updated number the installation guys should contact me on. The guy said me to wait till evening, the appointment has been booked at 6 pm and then contact again tomorrow if no one shows up. I sure waited till evening postponing my plans to see if anyone comes home to install the TV. But sure enough no body shows up.I then get the call from Flipkart at 1:08 PM on 11th August. He said to me that he has placed a request for address change(cause he can not just change phone number, he has to request address change to change the phone number) and promised me that the installation will be done by 12th August. I waited at my home for installation guys to come home whole day on 12th August. NOBODY SHOWS UP. No call even on my updated number.Now already loosing my patience, I call Flipkart cust care on 1800 208 9898 at 9:45 AM 13th August. She was not helpful at all. She said she was sorry and she is raising complaint and said that it will be resolved by 16th August. Furious, I denied to wait till then and wanted to get in contact with someone local. She denied that she can not give any number. However she did give me jeeves cust service number 1800 425 365 365. I called jeeves number but it was not helpful at all as it was phone mobile phones.I then looked up flipkart jeeves online and got the number 1800 4252 5252. I spoke to a lady and she said that the system says the customer is not ready. Surprised I asked why would it say that. I was ready waiting for the installation whole day yesterday and no body showed up. She also said that my new updated number is in the system and she is escalating the issue. And promised me that the installation will be done today by 7 pm. And technician will contact me within 3 hours.I get the call from flipkart(not the technician) at 13th August 12:19PM to let me know that the installation will be done today by 7 pm.I waited till more than 3 hours but didn't receive any call from technician. So I again call 1800 4252 5252 at 4:54PM 13th August and spoke with lady. She informed me that the technician has been assigned and he will install it by today 7pm. And that I can contact him on his number. I hung up the phone and called him immediately at 5:00 pm 13th August. He mentioned that he tried calling me yesterday 12th August but didn't get answer so we don't come. It is their policy to not visit customer house if they don't receive phone call. And he continued that it is 5 pm which is late now and there is no person available to perform installation today. I said I was promised to have installation done today by flipkart. And he said he can not come.I immediately call the 1800 4252 5252 number at 5:11. Spoke with guy and said that I have the technician number. I said I spoke to him and said he cant come. But I cant wait and has to have this installation done which was 3 days overdue. He said that he has escalated the issue and there will be an alternative technician allocated for installation. I should not worry and sure enough that the installation will be done today.I waited an hour and call the 1800 4252 5252 at 6:17 to get update on installation and alternative technician person. The person repeated same tale and said that he has escalated the issue and the installation will be done by end of the day today.Waited 45 minutes and called 1800 4252 5252 again at 7:04 pm and said it is past 7 pm and no body has showed up for installation. He said installation will be done by the end of the day. however is was already end of the day. He said he is escalating issue and I said the issue has been escalated twice and nothing has been done. He said that installation will be done today. However the technician is not responding. I asked if technician is not responding then how will the installation be done today. He then proceeds to tell me that he is escalating to branch manager. He spoke to branch manager and has given my details to him also told me that branch manager will be contacting me within 15 minutes.I sure waited 20 minutes and no body calls me. I called 1800 4252 5252 number again and repeated my issue and said that I want installation done today. Now they are saying that the branch is closed and installation will be done tomorrow. Again false promise. I ask her to ask branch manager to call me. She agrees.I waited, but no one called. My installation was not performed. All I was given was false hope. I had to postpone my plans for installation.Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

I purchased Thomson LED TV from Flipkart on 17th June 2019 and at the installation was done on 21st June 2019. During the installation time itself Jeeves engineer noticed manufacturing defect on TV with the Optical Audio Output port, and took photo and assured me TV will be replaced. Then the next day I got a call from Flipkart Customer support regarding the purchase, and I told them about the issue and they noted it and told me that TV will be replaced as its a Manufacturing defect.Then got call from Jeeves and they scheduled a technician visit at my place to take photo and video of the defect so that they can proceed with replacement. I received calls and messages continously from Jeeves regarding this and on every call I was assured that they are working on the replacement and 5 seperate engineers visited my home to take photo and videos telling that its part of their replacement process and everytime I was assured that replacement will be done soon.On July 4th morning I received call from Jeeves customer service and told me to initiate a replacement with Flipkart. Flipkart customer service told that the 10 day replacement period was over and it cannot be replaced, and they were unaware of any complaint from my end.The service engineer who came for installation is from Jeeves( Flipkart subsidiary), and he knew it on the first day itself and told me that he will report to flipkart regarding this and I dont have to do anything from my part. Also I have informed this issue with the Flipkart customer support the very next day after installation.For the last months I have been receiving calls and messages from Flipkart and Jeeves and 5 engineers visited my place and took photos and videos, telling that it's needed for replacement and nothing happened. I waited as Thomson is a new brand and don't wanted to spoil the brand reputation.Beware:- Buying @ThomsonTvIndia from @Flipkart forget about #service and #support Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! title_text: One of Bad experience from Flipkart this time
Review: I ordered HP deskjet laser 5275 printer on 19.07.2019. & It came to delivered address in 22.07.2019. after checking that I observed that their is and issue in catridge on same day. After 3 hrs( once received printer) immediately I called to customer care(flipkart) they are not understanding the issue what I am telling and they told that on 25th our technician will visit to your place and check the issue. I waited for that then on 24th I received msg in Flipkart portal that our executive has visited and we will replace the printer (but no one has called and came to my address) and they given false information as well and I called immediately to customer care they are talking rubbish thing also and they don't knw what exactly problem as well and they are trying to give solution over phone and they are arguing like we are not sending executives to your place. On 26th evening I send msg in FB to Hp service center some one called from HP Service center within 2 hr they resolved issue on 27.07.2019( from local service person has came and he put new catridge, (black color) ) now my problem is solved from HP service centerbut in Flipkart port on 25th again they update on 26.07.2019 from HP technical visit will come to your place if it's not resolved we will replace printer. On 26.07.2019 same thing happens no one has came and they are telling replacement will do pls pack your printer we will do pick & replace . On 26.07. 2019 again I called to customer care same old story they told. Then I thought no use.But they wasted my money & time as well from 22.07.2019 to 27.07.2019 and on that 5 days I took almost 380 page printouts from outside (browsing center) I spent almost RS. 650 to RS. 700. Why customer is buying customer care executives are not understanding.On 28.07.2019 courier person came and asked replacement for printer kindly give old one and replace new. title_text: Cheater, Liars and Pathetic Service Providers
Review: I ordered a King size bed on 17th June 2019. The product got delivered with open packaging from both sides on 20th June 2019. The Installation of the same was done on 21st June 2019. After installation when we checked the bed it was broken from 2 sides. I immediately reported that to Flipkart on 22nd of June 2019. They said a technician will visit and we will pick the order and issue a refund for the same. A technician came on 29th June 2019. He clicked a photograph of the bed and told that it was damaged at the time of installation as it is a bed that requires screws to be bolted and the damage was done in the place where the screw was put.I spoke to Flipkart the very same time and got the technician to talk to Flipkart for that as well (I have a call recording for the same). I was told that we will get the pick up done and issue refund for the same. I was okay with it. Now after 2 days when pick up was not done. I again called Flipkart and asked the status then the agent said "The seller has arranged technician visit again and then we will pick up the order. I said ok. I receive a message that stated technician visit will take place in 3 days. Now, the same day evening I received another message stating "Service is Completed".I was amazed as nobody came to my place at all. Nobody called either. I then called Flipkart and further wrote an email to them stating what has happened. The agent I spoke to said, "Sir, it is a technical error don't worry, the technician visit is still on". After arguing over this for an hour I hung up the call and waited for the technician to come. But nobody came.I then wrote an email to their CS-HEAD team explaining everything, I got a reply from an Agent named "NANDINI" also a call from her she said to wait 48 hours she is looking into the issue. After 4 days I got a call again from her and she said "Sir, the seller has approved the return, we will pick up your order and issue refund post pick up" I said okay. This was said on 30th June 2019. I received a text message post that interaction from Jeeves again stating that product will be picked up and a technician was assigned. I called the technician on the number provided, he said " Sir, we do not have anything to pack the product" I have to send an email to the team to get approval for cardboard box otherwise I will get it from somewhere else, give me 2-3 days. I said okay. Every day I used to receive a message that uninstallation is rescheduled as per your request which was wrong. So, I waited till 08th July 2019 for them to arrange a cardboard box.Now, after 8 days that is today 08th July 2019. I got a call from the CS-HEAD AGENT NANDINI, who said Sir, your return has been rejected by the seller as they are saying that as per the second technician the damage was caused by you. I was shell shocked, as nobody came to my place to visit at all. She kept arguing and gave the same robotic speech that Sir, we are dependent on seller and the technician has said that it is your fault so, we will not be able to do anything. I was fuming with anger as Flipkart is literally trying to fool the customer. First of all, Nobody came to my house to look into the bed.Secondly, After committing on a recorded call that the product will be picked up and we will issue refund regarding the same. She was now giving wrong information. Third, she was saying she has no idea regarding technician visit and she is dependent on the seller for this. Well, the seller of the bed is FLIPKART ITSELF. (I have call recordings for the communications along with app screenshot and emails). The bed has been uninstalled by Flipkart on 8th July 2019 and is still lying in my bedroom packed. I want to know when will the resolution be provided for this. When will I get my refund and when will this be picked up?Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

title_text: Flipkart is my last option to buy any product
Review: I am a flipkart member and I want to share my experience after being its customer for more than 4 years.Flipkart is very expensive, it charges more compared to other sites eg. amazon.I searched for puma shoes in flipkart, it was for rs2500 but I was getting the same puma shoe for rs1800 in other site.Huge price difference.This type of price difference is in most of the items of flipkart.It contains cheap quality products too, i remember when I ordered a back support from flipkart.In flipkart's app it showed that it was of brand'tynor' and the rating was also 4+, only for which I ordered it but when it got delivered, it was an unbranded one, poorly packed also it was damaged.I rang to customer service and asked for refund but they said that they cannot give refund but will replace it though the product was refundable.Guess what, the replacement which came was also an unbranded one.Flipkart gives on time delivery but its customer service is uncooperative.App and website design of flipkart is also not good because I have to go through a lot of pages, verification, giving email between my clicking on buy now button and my order getting placed.Flipkart is reliable only for few brands like Mi, Nokia, for which it gives offer and good discounts.So, all because of this I keep flipkart as my last option to buy anything.Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! title_text: Who is the King? Customer or Delivery Agent?
Review: I have ordered groceries from Flikart. To my surprise they have scheduled their own timing and informed that the products will be delivered on 20th May 2019 before 9 pm. At 10.30 pm, the delivery agent called me and informed that he is in Choolai(5 Kms from my residence) and confirmed that he will deliver before midnight. I am surprised to know that the customer should be awake to receive the consignment and dance according to the tunes. I refuted that I will not be awake and asked to deliver on 21st May 2019 morning, but I got a message from Flipkart that I have rescheduled the delivery on 21st from 8pm to 10.30pm, which I have not done.I called the helpline and spoke to Miss Dhrishti and she said that I have fixed the delivery time. I said that is not by done by me and asked her to reschedule and deliver during the first half of the day. She said it is not possible as there is no provision in the system(but earlier she said I rescheduled, now she says there is no provision).I checked the website of Flipkart and it is mentioned that we need to coordinate with the Courier agent. But they have not provided any contact details of the courier agent. Pathetic.These guys should learn from Amazon and Myntra.Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.

title_text: MarQ by Flipkart 8.5kg semi-automatic top loaded w
Review: #Flipkart is actually #FRAUD_ KART.its a #Cheater & #Fraud Company.Beware and read the following cheating/fraud done with me.I purchased a washing machine ( MarQ by Flipkart 8.5kg semi-automatic top loaded washing machine) under order id #OD115061726929878000 from Flipkart and it was delivered on 02/04/19 having 10 days return policy and the seller was #Omni_ Tech_ Retail.But the product I received was a faulty product as wash tub of machine was leaking and door/cover was also broken. I raised the complaint and requested for replacement, technician also visited me on 04/04/19 and approved the replacement and on 07/04/19 and I also written email to Flipkart regarding this, but on 09/04/19 my request was cancelled by Flipkart by saying that new machine is out of stock you please raise the request for return. I again raised a new request for return of the faulty product ( within 10 days from delivery date) , again technician visited me on 12/04/19 and approved the return and on 16/04/19 I was given assurance via email that by 20/04/19 my issue will be resolved but this time also my request was cancelled before 20th April without giving any reason.Once again I contacted the Flipkart and they apologized for the inconvenience caused and asked me again to raise the return request, I do the same and on 25/04/19 once again Flipkart assured me that by 29/04/19 my issue will be resolved and my money will be refunded, but before 29th April, 3rd time Flipkart cancelled my request without giving any reason. Once again I followed/repeated the whole process and by showing very much regret and apologies Flipkart asked me to provide one more chance and unwillingly I agreed for the same and they assured me that this time 100% my issue will be resolved by 06/05/19 and I will get back my money. But alas this time also my request gets cancelled for 4th time without giving any reason.Till date more than 1 month has passed and my money is blocked with #Fraud_ Kart.so I request all of you please don't be fool, don't use Flipkart app, delete it. otherwise you people may also loose your hard earned money.There are so many online shopping platform, go for some other good, genuine and responsible app.RegardsAli Sarwat94100870948477886655Flag This ReviewIrrelevantFakeJunk   Thank You! We appreciate your effort.
